newsitem.title: FRANCE: France sells extra 2.468 bln Ffr of OATs.
newsitem.headline: France sells extra 2.468 bln Ffr of OATs.

text.p: The Treasury said on Friday it sold a further 2.468 billion francs of OATs after Thursday's auction, increasing the total value of bonds sold to 20.297 billion.

N/A
NOTE - The Treasury originally announced it would sell 16 to 18 billion francs of OATs in total today. The total bid cover ratio of the auction was 3.1.

Under the French system, primary dealers and central banks not only submit competitive bids at the auction, but also have the option, for a limited period after the sale, of buying extra bonds at the average auction price.
-- Paris Newsroom +331 4221 5452
